   20: 
   21: -module(etop_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %% Test functions
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   25: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   26: -export([text/1,text/2,text_tracing_off/1,text_tracing_off/2]).
   27: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   28: 
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: 
   31: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(1)).
   32: 
   33: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   34:     Dog=test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
   35:     [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
   36: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   37:     try apply(?MODULE,Case,[cleanup,Config])
   38:     catch error:undef -> ok
   39:     end,
   40:     Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
   41:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
   42:     ok.
   43: 
   44: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   45: 
   46: all() -> 
   47:     [text, text_tracing_off].
   48: 
   49: groups() -> 
   50:     [].
   51: 
   52: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   53:     Config.
   54: 
   55: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   56:     ok.
   57: 
   58: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   62:     Config.
   63: 
   64: 
   65: %% Start etop with text presentation
   66: text(_) ->
   67:     {ok,Node} = test_server:start_node(node2,peer,[]),
   68: 
   69:     %% Must spawn this process, else the test case will never end.
   70:     spawn_link(etop,start,[[{node,Node},{output,text},{interval,3}]]),
   71:     timer:sleep(4000),
   72:     etop:config(interval,2),
   73:     timer:sleep(3000),
   74:     etop:config(lines,5),
   75:     timer:sleep(3000),
   76:     etop:config(accumulate,true),
   77:     timer:sleep(3000),
   78:     etop:config(sort,reductions),
   79:     timer:sleep(3000),
   80:     etop:config(sort,memory),
   81:     timer:sleep(3000),
   82:     etop:config(sort,msg_q),
   83:     timer:sleep(3000),
   84:     ok.
   85: text(cleanup,_Config) ->
   86:     etop:stop(),
   87:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
   88:     Node = list_to_atom("node2@"++Host),
   89:     test_server:stop_node(Node).
   90: 
   91: text_tracing_off(suite) ->
   92:     [];
   93: text_tracing_off(doc) ->
   94:     ["Start etop with text presentation, and tracing turned off"];
   95: text_tracing_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   96:     {ok,Node} = test_server:start_node(node2,peer,[]),
   97: 
   98:     %% Must spawn this process, else the test case will never end.
   99:     spawn_link(etop,start,[[{node,Node},
  100: 				  {output,text},
  101: 				  {interval,3},
  102: 				  {tracing,off}]]),
  103:     timer:sleep(4000),
  104:     etop:config(interval,2),
  105:     timer:sleep(3000),
  106:     etop:config(lines,5),
  107:     timer:sleep(3000),
  108:     etop:config(accumulate,true),
  109:     timer:sleep(3000),
  110:     etop:config(sort,memory),
  111:     timer:sleep(3000),
  112:     etop:config(sort,msg_q),
  113:     timer:sleep(3000),
  114:     etop:config(sort,runtime), % this should not crash, but has no effect
  115:     timer:sleep(3000),
  116:     ok.
  117: text_tracing_off(cleanup,_Config) ->
  118:     etop:stop(),
  119:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  120:     Node = list_to_atom("node2@"++Host),
  121:     test_server:stop_node(Node).
  122:
